name: Queen Rules
storyline: An evil witch puts a spell on the world —a curse—kind of like a plague. Kingdoms that have run peacefully for thousands of years are confused and in chaos. Nothing is working. The most powerful and benevolent King and Queen of them all—the game’s main characters—decide this curse must be stopped. They need the player’s help. Traveling kingdom by kingdom, the player frees the good people of the witch’s spell and returns the land to peace and harmony. If the situation reminds you of the current pandemic, it’s not lost on us either. Enjoy!
summary:
This unique puzzle game invites you to explore enchanted kingdoms as you overcome fun, increasingly difficult levels. Beautiful clay art creates a magical experience.
Explore this hypnotic world built of handmade modeling FIMO clay characters. What's your vehicle? Logic and planning. It's a puzzle experience that's challenging but fun.

videos.title: Queen Rules - The Super Fun Puzzle Game
